metadata.title: CVE-2024-27024 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/rds: fix WARNING in rds_conn_connect_if_downIf connection isn't established yet, get_mr() will fail, trigger connectionafterget_mr().

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
